articles.content: Which translated to no time for Kim to breathe as she juggled her work, bar exam studies and the care of North, 7, Saint, 5, Chicago, 2, and 19-month-old Psalm at the family's main Calabasas, Calif.,… [+628 chars]

articles.title: Music fans to socially distance in COVID-safe 'pods' at Adelaide's Summer Sounds Festival - ABC News
articles.description: After months of negotiations with health authorities, organisers of the Summer Sounds Festival have been granted permission to stage a three-week music event in Adelaide. Here's how it will work.
